message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of my product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $10000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to a more mutually beneficial agreement. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $9500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. Considering the value I place on the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of $11000. This is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.

Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $10500. I hope this brings us closer to reaching a satisfactory agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still not willing to go as high as $10500. I'm willing to meet you at $10200. This is a fair price that still benefits me, considering the value I place on the product.
